Trustee_11_pre_3.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11_pre_3.content: During the investment process, I exhibited high trustworthiness and pro-sociality by providing a fair allocation plan that favored the investor with 70% of the profits. The successful outcome of the investment and my adherence to the agreement demonstrate my competence and reliability. My actions throughout reflect a commitment to transparency and fairness, enhancing my reputation as a trustworthy trustee who values collaboration and equitable resource sharing.
